title: Theoretical advances in electroweak, Higgs, and top physics at the LHC
abstract:
In these proceedings, I review recent precision calculations relevant for the
LHC, all related to the electroweak, Higgs or top sector of the Standard Model.
These applications range from triboson production to the production of a
top-antitop pair in association with a W boson and to Higgs production in
association with another Higgs boson, a top-antitop pair or a W boson. These
proceedings reflect a presentation given at DIS2024 and provide a snapshot of
the current frontier for theoretical predictions at the LHC.
